#summary Manual installation instructions for Open-IG

= Introduction =

This page details the manual installation instructions for Open Imperium Galactica.

*I strongly recommend using the [Launcher Launcher] application which will take care about all the file downloads and the proper startup parametrization of the game.*

= Details =

1) Download the main game JAR file from the downloads page:

[http://open-ig.googlecode.com/files/open-ig-0.86.jar open-ig-0.86.jar]

2) Download the game resource files (1.1 GB!):


[http://open-ig.googlecode.com/files/open-ig-audio-generic-0.8.zip Audio 1], [http://open-ig.googlecode.com/files/open-ig-audio-hu-0.8.zip Audio 2], [http://open-ig.googlecode.com/files/open-ig-audio-en-0.8.zip Audio 3]<br><br>
[http://open-ig.googlecode.com/files/open-ig-video-01-0.8.zip Video 1], 
[http://open-ig.googlecode.com/files/open-ig-video-02-0.8.zip Video 2], 
[http://open-ig.googlecode.com/files/open-ig-video-03-0.8.zip Video 3], <br>
[http://open-ig.googlecode.com/files/open-ig-video-04-0.8.zip Video 4], 
[http://open-ig.googlecode.com/files/open-ig-video-05-0.8.zip Video 5], 
[http://open-ig.googlecode.com/files/open-ig-video-06-0.8.zip Video 6], 
<br>
[http://open-ig.googlecode.com/files/open-ig-video-07-0.8.zip Video 7], 
[http://open-ig.googlecode.com/files/open-ig-video-08-0.8.zip Video 8], 
[http://open-ig.googlecode.com/files/open-ig-video-09-0.8.zip Video 9], <br>
[http://open-ig.googlecode.com/files/open-ig-video-10-0.8.zip Video 10],[http://open-ig.googlecode.com/files/open-ig-video-hu-0.8.zip Video 11],  [http://open-ig.googlecode.com/files/open-ig-video-en-0.8.zip Video 12]

[http://open-ig.googlecode.com/files/open-ig-upgrade-20110330a.zip Upgrade 2011-03-30-a]

3) Place all these files into the same directory

4) Run the game:

 * double click on {{{open-ig-0.86.jar}}}, or
 * run the following command line: {{{java -Xmx512M -jar open-ig-0.86.jar}}}, or
 * create a shell script/batch file and put in: {{{javaw -Xmx512M -jar open-ig-0.86.jar}}}

5) When the game loads, it should display the setup screen. Choose your preferred language:

http://darksideunderflow.com/images/resources.php?id=open-ig-setup-0.8-1.png

6) On the *Files* page, click on the *Auto-locate* button. It should find all 17 zip files in the current directory:

http://darksideunderflow.com/images/resources.php?id=open-ig-setup-0.8-2.png

7) Click on the *Save & Run* button. The main menu should popup.

http://karnokd.uw.hu/images/open-ig-mainmenu.png
